item.title: Moparscape vs R-S moderators
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Inb4 You read “google”.

“google mods can talk with you. mpscp mods have their arses in their heads.” Says it all. Naw, love you all. Erm…

Now, on a serious note, it’s a tough choice. MoparScape’s mods never get hacked, as R-S’s do from what I’ve heard, but that has nothing to do with the moderators unless they really make their password an easy get. A majority of MoparScape’s mods are very inactive, but they’re all very serious and can offer help and advice where it’s needed (Note I am just talking about MoparScape’s mods). However, google’s mod’s seem more… into it, like in the scene. Maybe it’s because there Kevin or whoever promotes mods sees that people can like their jobs and be good at it. But, because I’m from here, I voted MoparScape.

Read full topic
